```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggmap)
```

## All samples

```{r}
allmd = read.csv("all-projects-metadata/kdm-metadata-samples.csv")
str(allmd)
table(allmd$Species)
```

```{r}
ofinterest = allmd %>% 
    filter(Species %in% c("conica", "magnificata", "sp. aff. magnificata", "melliodora"),
           SampleSet != "Msupple",
           !grepl("Recollect", ID)) %>% 
    select(ID, SampleSet, Species, Location, Latitude, Longitude, SeedYesNo, SeedNotes, Sequenced) %>% 
    arrange(Species, Location, SeedYesNo)
write.csv(ofinterest, "magnificata/ofinterest.csv")
```
